fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface ExpressionFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface ExpressionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common expressions in programming languages.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createBinaryExpression

        Expression createBinaryExpression(Expression _left,
                                  BinaryOperator _operator,
                                  Expression _right)
        Create a node for a binary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _left - Abstract Syntax Tree for the left parameter of the binary operation.
        _operator - Enum value for the binary operator.
        _right - Abstract Syntax Tree for the right parameter of the binary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the binary operation.

      • createUnaryExpression

        Expression createUnaryExpression(UnaryOperator _operator,
                                 Expression _parameter)
        Create a node for an unary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _operator - Enum value for the unary operator.
        _parameter - Abstract Syntax Tree for the parameter of the unary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the unary operation.

      • createIntegerValue

        Value createIntegerValue(java.lang.String _texte)
        Create a node for an integer value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _texte - Textual representation of the value of the Abstract Syntax Tree IntegerValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the integer constant.

      • createBooleanValue

        Value createBooleanValue(boolean _value)
        Create a node for a boolean value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _value - Boolean value for the Abstract Syntax Tree BooleanValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the boolean constant.

      • createVariableUse

        Expression createVariableUse(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
        Create a node for a variable use expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the declaration of the variable.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access to a variable.

      • createVariableAssignment

        Assignable createVariableAssignment(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
        Create a node for a variable assignment in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the declaration of the variable.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access to a variable.

      • createCouple

        Expression createCouple(Expression _left,
                        Expression _right)
        Create a node for a couple creation expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _left - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the left part of the couple.
        _right - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the right part of the couple.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a couple containing the _left and _right parts.

      • createFirst

        Expression createFirst(Expression _couple)
        Create a node for an access to the first value of a couple expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _couple - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the couple.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the left part of the _couple.

        Expression createSecond(Expression _couple)
        Create a node for an access to the first value of a couple expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _couple - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the couple.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the right part of the _couple.

      • createFunctionCall

        FunctionCall createFunctionCall(Expression _called)
        Create a node for a function call expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _called - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the called function.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the call of the _called function.

      • createArrayAccess

        Expression createArrayAccess(Expression _array,
                             Expression _index)
        Create a node for an access to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _array - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the array.
        _index - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the index in the array.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _index cell in the _array.

      • createArrayAssignment

        Assignable createArrayAssignment(Assignable _array,
                                 Expression _index)
        Create a node for an assignment to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _array - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the array.
        _index - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the index in the array.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _index cell in the _array.

      • createFieldAccess

        Expression createFieldAccess(Expression _record,
                             FieldDeclaration _field)
        Create a node for an access to a field in a record expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference to the Field Declaration with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _record - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the record.
        _field - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the field in the record.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _field in the _record.

      • createFieldAssignment

        Expression createFieldAssignment(Assignable _record,
                                 FieldDeclaration _field)
        Create a node for an assignment to a field in a record expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference to the Field Declaration with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _record - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the record.
        _field - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the field in the record.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _field in the _record.

      • createFieldAccess

        Expression createFieldAccess(Expression _record,
                             java.lang.String _name)
        Create a node for an access to a field in a record expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. without resolving the reference to the field name with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _record - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the record.
        _name - Name of the field in the record.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _name in the _record.

      • createFieldAssignment

        Expression createFieldAssignment(Assignable _record,
                                 java.lang.String _name)
        Create a node for an assignment to a field in a record expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. without resolving the reference to the field name with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _record - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the record.
        _name - Name of the field in the record.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _name in the _record.

      • createPointerAccess

        Expression createPointerAccess(Expression _pointer)
        Create a node for an access to the pointed value in an expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _pointer - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the pointer.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the content of the _pointer.

      • createPointerAssignment

        Expression createPointerAssignment(Assignable _pointer)
        Create a node for an assignment to the pointed value in an expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _pointer - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the pointer.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the content of the _pointer.

      • createTypeConversion

        Expression createTypeConversion(Expression _target,
                                Type _type)
        Create a node for a type conversion of an expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _target - Abstract Syntax Tree for the expression whose value is converted.
        _type - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type toward which the expression value is converted.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the conversion of the value of a target expression to a type.

      • createSequence

        Sequence createSequence()
        Create a node for a sequence of expressions in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the creation of a sequence of values.

      • createSequence

        Sequence createSequence(java.lang.Iterable<Expression> _values)
        Create a node for a sequence of expressions in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _values - Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for the values in the collection.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the creation of a collection of values.
